ygData.subject: Re: Tallon Zek Proposal
ygData.msgSnippet: heheh. I got alot of 30plus ppl playing with me heheh. ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive Pacific Internet Technical Support Department .
ygData.messageBody:
heheh. I got alot of 30plus ppl playing with me heheh.


Entreri wrote:

> okay..if JUST one person cannot bear to leave their chr in innoruuk,we
> would all stay or like very unfair to him.ok?Unless all willing then
> we move? BTW Gary,u too high level liao,cannot group with rest of the

>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 09:43
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Tallon Zek Proposal
> personally i think thats not a bad idea... and i
> will only move if majority does... and i think its
> quite hard as the previous time u guys try to
> switch... n wasnt very successful... anyway... do
> let me know what everyone decides... will be fun
> if all could shift though... my 2cpNicademous
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Entreri
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 10:24 PM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Tallon Zek
> Proposal
> Hi guys,I propose that we all move to
> Tallon Zek[PvP Teams].Okay here are my
> SUGGESTIONS on why we MIGHT wanna move
> there.However if there isnt much
> support,I will stay in Innoruuk with u
> guys.All critisims are
> welcomed! 1.Guild:Okay,lets face it,for
> normal servers,Guild aint of much fan
> except of a tag there.I foresee that if
> a guild is set up in Tallon Zek,it would
> be much more meaningfull in the sense
> that when everyone has a common goal and
> at the same time roleplaying WHAT it
> should be[huh?A paladin and SK chatting
> with each other?].Serious roleplaying
> could be carried to the fullest and the
> tension when going over zones which WILL
> encourage grouping 2.New Server.Since
> its new,it would be nice that there will
> be players around to group. 3.MAIN
> POINT:The tension!This time,you would be
> much more carefull going through zones
> and when buddies come the fullest and
> where racism too :).Although all the
> Singaporean EQ Players would be best if
> same group,however we could have some
> not in this group so they could set up
> their own guild and wage war with us
> which WILL defintely improve the SG EQ
> community.If we could not be friends,we
> could be still foes :) 4.ok..high level
> players..ahem Garren...There seems to be
> a quest to switch servers though I do
> not encourage this coz it would be more
> fun if everyone same level. 5.SG
> Mauling:heh..Imagine all 35SG players on
> this list play same group and have a
> FULLSCALE invasion on
> Freeport?hehe...imagine the fun.. 6.The
> spirit bond BTW on SG players will
> defintely tighten with this..:) 7.Makes
> higher lv SGs get good items for their
> lower SG counterparts so our SG strength
> could be increased.[Note:Coz 300levels4s
> could maul a level50?] 8.We could have
> serious planning on what class to use so
> we would not be as messy as now... 9.We
> had PROBABLY wrongly configured our chr
> in the past so it would be a nice
> change 10.SGs players are now split into
> 2..mainly the highlevels and low
> levels..It would be nice if this
> everyone would be same level again Thx
> for reading...just my
